11 #ifndef VERSION
12 #define VERSION "0.0.0"

14 
15 void info(PropellerImage image)
16 {
17  qDebug() << "-------------------------------------------";
18  qDebug() << " Image:" << qPrintable(image.fileName());
19  qDebug() << " Type:" << (image.imageType() ? "EEPROM" : "Binary");
20  qDebug() << " Size:" << image.imageSize();
21  qDebug() << " Checksum:" << (image.checksum() ? "INVALID" : "PASS");
22  qDebug() << "";
23  qDebug() << " Program size:" << image.programSize();
24  qDebug() << " Variable size:" << image.variableSize();
25  qDebug() << " Free/stack size:" << image.stackSize();
26  qDebug() << "";
27  qDebug() << " Clock mode:" << qPrintable(image.clockModeText());
28  if (image.clockMode() != 0x00 && image.clockMode() != 0x01)
29  qDebug() << " Clock frequency:" << image.clockFrequency();
30  qDebug() << "-------------------------------------------";
31 }
32 
33 int main(int argc, char *argv[])
34 {
35  QCoreApplication app(argc, argv);
36 
37  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationName("Parallax Inc.");
38  QCoreApplication::setOrganizationDomain("www.parallax.com");
39  QCoreApplication::setApplicationVersion(VERSION);
40  QCoreApplication::setApplicationName(QObject::tr("Propeller Manager CLI"));
41 
42  QCommandLineParser parser;
43  parser.addHelpOption();
44  parser.addVersionOption();
45  parser.setApplicationDescription(
46  QObject::tr("\nA command-line wrapper to the Propeller Manager API"
47  "\nCopyright 2015 by %1").arg(QCoreApplication::organizationName()));
48 
49  QCommandLineOption argList( QStringList() << "l" << "list", QObject::tr("List available devices"));
50  QCommandLineOption argWrite( QStringList() << "w" << "write", QObject::tr("Write program to EEPROM"));
51  QCommandLineOption argDevice( QStringList() << "d" << "device",QObject::tr("Device to program (default: first system device)"), "DEV");
52  QCommandLineOption argPin( QStringList() << "p" << "pin", QObject::tr("Pin for GPIO reset"), "PIN");
53  QCommandLineOption argTerm( QStringList() << "t" << "terminal", QObject::tr("Drop into terminal after download"));
54  QCommandLineOption argIdentify( QStringList() << "i" << "identify", QObject::tr("Identify device connected at port"));
55 
56  parser.addOption(argList);
57  parser.addOption(argWrite);
58  parser.addOption(argDevice);
59  parser.addOption(argPin);
60  parser.addOption(argTerm);
61  parser.addOption(argIdentify);
62 
63  parser.addPositionalArgument("file", QObject::tr("Binary file to download"), "FILE");
64 
65  parser.process(app);
66 
67  QStringList device_list = PropellerSession::list_devices();
68  if (parser.isSet(argList))
69  {
70  for (int i = 0; i < device_list.size(); i++)
71  {
72  qDebug() << qPrintable(device_list[i]);
73  }
74  return 0;
75  }
76 
77  if (device_list.isEmpty())
78  {
79  qDebug() << "No devices available for download!";
80  return 1;
81  }
82 
83  QString device = device_list[0];
84  if (!parser.value(argDevice).isEmpty())
85  {
86  device = parser.value(argDevice);
87  if (!device_list.contains(device))
88  {
89  qDebug() << "Device name not available";
90  return 1;
91  }
92  }
93 
94 #if defined(Q_PROCESSOR_ARM_V6) && defined(Q_OS_LINUX)
95  int reset_pin = 17;
96 #else
97  int reset_pin = -1;
98 #endif
99 
100  if (!parser.value(argPin).isEmpty())
101  {
102  reset_pin = parser.value(argPin).toInt();
103  }
104  if (reset_pin > -1)
105  qDebug() << "Using GPIO pin" << reset_pin << "for hardware reset";
106 
107 
108  if (parser.isSet(argIdentify))
109  {
110  foreach (QString d, device_list)
111  {
112  PropellerSession loader(d,reset_pin);
113  loader.open();
114 
115  switch (loader.get_version())
116  {
117  case 1:
118  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %s", qPrintable(d), "Propeller P8X32A");
119  break;
120  case 0:
121  default:
122  qDebug("[ %-16s ] %-9s",qPrintable(d), "NOT FOUND");
123  break;
124  }
125 
126  loader.close();
127  }
128  }
129  else
130  {
131  PropellerSession loader(device,reset_pin);
132  if (loader.open())
133  return 1;
134 
135  if (parser.positionalArguments().isEmpty())
136  {
137  qDebug() << "Error: Must provide name of binary";
138  return 1;
139  }
140 
141  QString filename = parser.positionalArguments()[0];
142  QRegularExpression re_binary(".*\\.binary$");
143  QRegularExpression re_eeprom(".*\\.eeprom$");
144 
145  if (filename.contains(re_binary))
146  {
147  PropellerImage image(Utility::readFile(filename),filename);
148  info(image);
149  loader.upload_binary(image, parser.isSet(argWrite));
150  }
151  else if (filename.contains(re_eeprom))
152  {
153  PropellerImage image(Utility::readFile(filename),filename);
154  info(image);
155  loader.upload_binary(image, parser.isSet(argWrite));
156  }
157  else
158  {
159  qDebug() << "Invalid file specified";
160  }
161 
162  if (parser.isSet(argTerm))
163  loader.terminal();
164 
165  loader.close();
166  }
167 
168  return 0;
169 }
